article.title: CGI to Support Joint Strike Fighter Program Office
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: CGI Federal Incorporated, subsidiary of CGI Technologies and Solutions Incorporated, Fairfax, Virginia, is being awarded a $28,206,792 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for information technology support services for the Joint Strike Fighter Program Office.Â The Naval Air Warfare Center Aircraft Division, Lakehurst, New Jersey, is the contracting activity.
